data.md:MetaData: AtlantOS data products from multibeam EM122 data: METEOR cruise M124 (Atlantic)

The multibeam raw data has been cleaned, quality assured and processed using QPS Qimera. Data products include ungridded soundings, a bathymetric grid (150 m resolution) and an area shapefile. The data processing and provision took place within the EU Horizon 2020 project AtlantOS - Optimising and Enhancing the Integrated Atlantic Ocean Observing Systems. For map of transit track see: https://doi.org/10.1594/PANGAEA.869740
Raw multibeam EM122 data: METEOR cruise M124 (SE Atlantic)
